Smart Array P212 in Slot 2

   array A

      physicaldrive 2E:1:3
         Port: 2E
         Box: 1
         Bay: 3
         Status: OK
         Drive Type: Data Drive
         Interface Type: SATA
         Size: 2 TB
         Rotational Speed: 7200
         Firmware Revision: CV26    
         Serial Number:             Z4Z15GS6
         Model: ATA     ST2000VX000-1ES1
         SATA NCQ Capable: True
         SATA NCQ Enabled: True
         Current Temperature (C): 22
         Maximum Temperature (C): 31
         PHY Count: 1
         PHY Transfer Rate: 1.5Gbps
